alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 8:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bradford County through 900 PM EDT... At 817 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starke, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph, excessive cloud-to-ground lightning, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Lawtey and Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
